description: A town on Cactus Island that appears to welcome pirates but is actually a Baroque Works base where bounty hunters pose as friendly townsfolk to capture unsuspecting pirates.
notableFeatures: Buildings designed to look welcoming to pirates

keyEvents.description: Luffy and Zoro engage in their intense battle in the streets of Whisky Peak due to a misunderstanding.
keyEvents.significance: The town becomes the battleground for one of the most memorable crew member fights in the series.

keyEvents.description: Baroque Works Officer Agents Mr. 5 and Miss Valentine arrive at Whisky Peak to eliminate traitors.
keyEvents.significance: The arrival of higher-ranking agents shows the town's importance as a Baroque Works base.

climate: Arid desert climate typical of Cactus Island
culturalSignificance: First town visited by the Straw Hats in the Grand Line, representing both the opportunities and dangers of the new sea.
